SKILLS SUPERMARKET

intellectronica/awesome-skills

Instructions

Skills extend the capabilities of AI agents with packaged routines, workflows, and knowledge.

You can run these skills in Claude or with any AI agent using the Skillz MCP server.

The skills listed here have been published by many commercial and community developers. To use a skill, retrieve it and upload it to Claude as a .zip file, or place it in the skills directory of Claude Code or ~/.skillz (for using with other agents).

To contribute new skills, please file an issue or submit a pull request on github.
